resources.string:
Handcent has published a new release that blocks Cadpage from functioning correctly. See http://facebook.com/cadpage for more information.
 
 This release adds more user configurable response buttons. And the capability to have response buttons send text replies as well as initiate phone calls. For users who are registered to receive direct pages, the direct paging vendor can now define the response buttons that will appear.
 
 New Locations:
 Butte County, CA
 Kent County, DE (alt)
 St Joseph County, IN
 Richland County, IL
 Rock Island County, IL
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Ozark, AL
 Waterford Town, CT
 Roxbury, CT renamed to Northwest Public Safety, CT
 Kent County, DE
 Sarasota County, FL
 Prince Georges County, MD
 Marion County, MS
 Oneida County, NY
 Cumberland Cuonty, NC
 Montgomery County, NC
 Hamilton County, OH
 Chester County, PA
 Liberty County, TX
 Montgomery County, TX
 King George County, VA
 
 General Fixes:
 Fixed crash when user disables all main menu buttons
 Fixed crash when direct paging vendor sends invalid URL
 General address parsing improvements
